comment._content: All of these photos are just breath taking.I wish I could read the information you've included with them here.

comment.realname: Biblioteca de Arte / Art Library Fundação Calouste Gulbenkian
comment.author: 26577438@N06
comment._content:
Dear flickrian,
Unforttunately we can not make a translation of all the portuguese descriptions in  english. 
But, I can tell you that this photo is from a portuguese palace in Lisbon named Count of Farrobo Palace. The count of Farrobo was a portuguese noble in the 19 century. The palace was built in the 18 century and transformed in the 19.
Best regards
Art Library
